characters: Driver of the self-driving vehicle, driver of the black SUV
summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is approaching an intersection. The road is clear initially, but as the vehicle nears the intersection, a black SUV appears from the left side and moves into the lane ahead of the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is slowing down as it approaches the intersection. The vehicles speed decreases gradually to accommodate the black SUV merging into the lane from the left side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black SUV, approximately 2 meters away, merging into the lane ahead of the self-driving vehicle.
